displaytitle: Study of a woman with arms raised holding a salver
medium: Black chalk, heightened with white, squared in black chalk
creditline: Museum purchase, Laura P. Hall Memorial Fund

titles.title: Seated female figure holding a salver

texts.remarks: As per Giada Damen, IMLS Drawings 2018-2020
